snippet: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann said Michael Bradley would serve as captain during the Gold Cup, the latest punishment for Dempsey’s confrontation with a referee.
abstract: Michael Bradley will replace Clint Dempsey as United States national soccer team captain during Concacaf Gold Cup soccer tournament; Dempsey has been marred by Major League Soccer and United States Open Cup for getting into argument with referee during match in June.
lead_paragraph: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann said Michael Bradley would serve as captain during the Gold Cup, the latest punishment for Dempsey’s confrontation with a referee.

headline.main: Clint Dempsey Replaced as U.S. National Team Captain
headline.print_headline: Dempsey Removed as U.S. Captain After Altercation With Referee

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
